column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've never heard of this place and it's a shame because I'm obsessed with pizza and I live in Chicago! Once I found out about it we had to go. With tons of reviews
column2: why shouldn't we. Pizza is awesome
column3: fresh sauce and believe me you can tell. The right amount of cheese and the crust was amazing. Not many deep dish places you go to and you actually enjoy the crust
column4: but this place has it going on. The wait is a bit long but expected when it comes to deep dish. I didn't like the shoes and skateboards on the wall
column5: kind of a dirty thing to have in a restaurant. Other than that it would've been 5 stars for me.
